message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. My initial offer for the product is $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $14,000 is a bit high for me right now.  I'm willing to pay $13,000. Let's see if we can make this work.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer for the product is $13,500.
